ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: The authors are grateful to the pathologists Dr Koichi Ohshima and Dr Naoya Nakamura for their support with the Central Pathology Review, to Dr Satoko Shimada for immunohistochemical analysis of SOX11 and Ki‚Äê67, and to the members of the JCOG Data Center and JCOG Operations Office for their support in preparing the manuscript (Dr Kenichi Nakamura and Dr Kenichi Miyamoto), data management (Ms Yuko Watanabe), and oversight of study management (Dr Haruhiko Fukuda).
